document.full_text: egypt shut its border crossing with gaza on saturday for the first time since opening it on a routine basis last month, and angry palestinians stormed the gates in protest, hamas officials and witnesses said.
document.title: palestinians storm shut egypt crossing: witnesses
lines_and_colors: egypt shut its border crossing with gaza on saturday for the first time since opening it on a routine basis last month, and angry palestinians stormed the gates in protest, hamas officials and witnesses said.
